title: The Fourth Law of Kanaloa
description: Running from her past, jazz vocalist Maris Johnson finds refuge singing to the Navy men on the island paradise of Oahu. But her world forever changes when Pearl Harbor is attacked and a mysterious figure emerges from the sea to save her life.---Johan Twiss's first published foray into short fiction tells a satisfyingly self-contained story of magic, music, miracles, and true love. I hope he'll write more in this world! - Heather Monson, Editor
author: Johan Twiss
